urls.title: Howard Stern: 'I am all in on Joe Biden'
urls.description: Howard Stern announced Monday he's "all in on Joe Biden," saying President Trump "could have been ahead of this curve" on the coronavirus pandemic.

text: Howard Stern announced Monday he's "all in on Joe Biden," saying President Trump "could have been ahead of this curve" on the coronavirus pandemic.  https://t.co/RUwfDaC7Ku
